title: Quick question about ranked matchment
body:
Hello :)

Is it less likely to be matched with players from your friend list and players that you've reported before?
I've heard stuff like that in the past and I want to confirm if it's actually true.

replies.body: I don't believe blocking or having someone on your friends list will affect getting matched with them at all, that'd be pretty neat! I could see some ways people could abuse that kind of thing though unfortunately =\
